# nodejs-random-string

## Installation

    $ npm install generate-key

## Usage for JS

```javascript
var rand = require("generate-key");

rand.generateKey(); // => wexO23UXGezfTKHc

// or

rand.generateKey(7); // => TShNQGc
```

## Usage for Coffee-Script

```coffeescript
rand = require "generate-key"

rand.generateKey() # => wexO23UXGezfTKHc

# or

rand.generateKey 7 # => TShNQGc

```
